data.text: Jack tried to save his family when the boiler exploded and destroyed the hotel, but the hotel (or the surrounding area around there) has been in a state of flux. Not surprising since King’s universe has been known to loop. #DarkTower #TheShining #EverythingIsConnected

NOTE: After looking over how Jack Torrance died in both the film and the book, I feel like the area that affected Jack and Danny so much is quantum locked in a sense. On one hand, Jack died, frozen in the maze, but on the other, he died in a horrific explosion. (1/?)
